DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy Oxybutynin Chloride 10 % Topical Gel child 3 less 17 year old , overactive bladder due neurogenic condition . Children treat 0.75 g gel/day two week . Patients return clinic potential dose titration . At time dose may adjust 1g/day , 0.5g/day , remain 0.75g gel/day depend individual response tolerability . The total treatment time 14 week total time study 16 week .
